attributes.action: Petition for article 50  to leave the eu be implemented immediately
attributes.additional_details: There is no point delaying invoking article 50 the process takes 2 years and a prime minister would not be directly involved in those negotiations. It is just a delaying tactic to the democratic process. I urge you to sign this petition to demonstrate the will of the majority
attributes.background: There is a petition to try and force a 2nd referendum which in my opinion is undemocratic we voted to leave with a majority over 1 million votes as far as I'm aware 1 is a majority
